Title: Do Bigha Zamin
Writer: Salil Choudhury (story), Paul Mahendra (Hindi dialogue), Hrishikesh Mukherjee (scenario)
Actors: Balraj Sahni, Nirupa Roy, Rattan Kumar, Murad
Plot: A small Bengali landowner and his young son are in danger when their two-acre farmland where they live is in danger of being taken over by a local zamindar (feudal lord) for failure to pay for mounting debits. They move to Calcutta where the father tries making a living as a rickshaw puller while his wife joins him but falls ill which threatens everything they have going to try to save their ancestorial home.
